description: System-generated unique identifier for a performance metric used in fleet reporting and dashboards.
Human-readable title or description for the performance metric shown to users in reports and dashboards.
Lowest permitted display height for rendering the metric’s visualization (likely in pixels; confirm with SME).
Lowest permitted display width for rendering the metric’s visualization (likely in pixels; confirm with SME).
Maximum display height allowed for the metric’s visualization to maintain layout consistency (likely in pixels; confirm with SME).
Maximum display width allowed for the metric’s visualization to maintain layout consistency (likely in pixels; confirm with SME).
